ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] General rule for posting links
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, I don t mind you adding links to the links section of the groups thingy. I just meant that when someone sends an email to the list with a link, I would
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, I don't mind you adding links to the links section of the groups thingy.
I just meant that when someone sends an email to the list with a link, I
would like them to include a description of what the link is for. If it is a
non-eq link the subject can say "OT" and then something about "my new list"
or something like that.
I'm not mad. I'm just insane. :-P
*time for me to go read my collection of Legion of Super-Heroes again--
thunderstorm is keeping me from playing EQ*
luv,
-Su

Hello,
THis is muaddib, and I put in a link to my new group i just started to get
people to come to the group. this is my frist group. i hope this has not
mada anyone mad, but it doesnt have anything to do with EverQuest. I may
start a EverQuest group but not sure yet. if this have made you mad plz tell
me and i will remove the link.
muaddib
